languages.text: "Все, хватит с меня этих нечестивых речей. Обернись, тварь Архиврага! Ты звал очистительное пламя на свою голову — и пламя явилось!"

traits.locale_text: "Во имя Золотого трона, почему ты медлишь, {name}? Долго мы еще будем слушать эти поганые речи?! Срази предателей прямо сейчас!"

languages.text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
languages.original_text: "Все, хватит с меня этих нечестивых речей. Обернись, тварь Архиврага! Ты звал очистительное пламя на свою голову — и пламя явилось!"

traits.locale_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of Chaos! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
"That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of Chaos! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
"That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
"That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
"That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"
"That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

languages.text: “够了，我已经受够了这些充满亵渎的话语。转过身来，混沌大敌的孽畜！你想要招致净化的火焰，而净化的火焰已经来了！”
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: “够了，我已经受够了这些充满亵渎的话语。转过身来，混沌大敌的孽畜！你想要招致净化的火焰，而净化的火焰已经来了！”

languages.text: «Ya basta. Ya me he hartado de estas palabras profanas. ¡Date la vuelta, bestia del Archienemigo! ¡Has invocado la llama purificadora sobre ti, y la llama ha llegado!».
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya basta. Ya me he hartado de estas palabras profanas. ¡Date la vuelta, bestia del Archienemigo! ¡Has invocado la llama purificadora sobre ti, y la llama ha llegado!».

languages.text: 「もういい、これ以上そのような不敬な言葉は聞きたくない。こちらを向け、渾沌の勢力の獣よ！お前達は浄化の炎を呼び出していたな…その炎のお出ましだ！」
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: 「もういい、これ以上そのような不敬な言葉は聞きたくない。こちらを向け、渾沌の勢力の獣よ！お前達は浄化の炎を呼び出していたな…その炎のお出ましだ！」

languages.text: "Jetzt reicht's, ich habe genug von diesen gottlosen Worten. Dreht Euch um, Bestie des Erzfeinds! Ihr habt die reinigende Flamme selbst gerufen – und jetzt ist sie da!"
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt reicht's, ich habe genug von diesen gottlosen Worten. Dreht Euch um, Bestie des Erzfeinds! Ihr habt die reinigende Flamme selbst gerufen – und jetzt ist sie da!"

languages.text: « C'en en assez de ces discours profanes. Tournez-vous, suppôt du Grand Ennemi ! Par vos actions, vous avez appelé sur vous la flamme purificatrice... et la flamme est venue ! »
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: « C'en en assez de ces discours profanes. Tournez-vous, suppôt du Grand Ennemi ! Par vos actions, vous avez appelé sur vous la flamme purificatrice... et la flamme est venue ! »

languages.text: "Bu kadar yeter, bıktım bu adi sözlerden. Vazgeç artık Şerbaşı'nın köpeği! Arındırıcı aleve boğulmayı sen istedin, ben de seni boğmaya geldim!"
languages.original_text: "That's it, I've had enough of these profane words. Turn around, beast of the Archenemy! You called down purifying flame upon yourself — and the flame has come!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar yeter, bıktım bu adi sözlerden. Vazgeç artık Şerbaşı'nın canavarı! Arındırıcı aleve boğulmayı sen istedin, boğmaya geldim!"
